title: Present ages of Anu and Raj are in the ratio 4:5. Eight years from now the ratio of their ages will be 5:6. What are their present ages? - Quora

response.answer_text: Friends..…! Let the rational between ages of Anu and Raj be x Present ages of Anu and Raj are in the ratio 4:5. So their ages are 4x and 5x Eight years from now the ratio of their ages will be 5:6 8 years from now their ages, 4x + 8 and 5x + 8 Their ratio is 5 : 6 4x + 8/5x + 8 = 5/6 Cross multiplication 5 (5x + 8) = 6 (4x + 8) 25x + 40 = 24x + 48 25x - 24x = 48 - 40 x = 8 The rational is 8, their ages Anu’s present age 4x = 4 × 8 = 32 years Raj's present age 5x = 5 × 8 = 40 years Answer the present ages of Anu is 32 years and present age of Raj is 40 years.

Let their present age be 4a and 5a. After 8 years, their ages will be (4a+8) and (5a+8) Ratio would be (4a+8) : (5a+8) But this ratio is given to be 5:6. Therefore (4a+8) : (5a+8) = 5:6 solve this (4a+8) / (5a+8) = 5/6 => 6 x (4a+8) = (5a+8) x 5 => 24a + 48 = 25a + 40 => a = 8 So their present age would be 4a = 4x8 = 32 5a = 5x8 = 40

Hello guys. The ratio of present ages of Anu and Raj is 4:5. Let k be the common multiple. So the age of Anu is 4k and that of Raj is 5k. After 8 years. Age of Anu is 4k+8. Age of Raj is 5k+8 . The ratio is 5:6 i.e. 4k+8/5k+8= 5/6 24k+48 = 25k + 40. k = 8. The present age of Anu is 4k = 32 and present age of Raj is 5k = 40 .
